meta_description: DevCore — automation of business processes and sales through Telegram, Web3, and AI. Development of automation solutions, web applications, mobile applications.
meta_keywords: web development, mobile applications, UI/UX design, digital transformation, DevCore
hero_subtitle: We automate business processes and sales through Telegram, Web3, and AI
services_cta: I want to work with you
audience_header: We work with businesses where automation is an investment
audience_not_fit_1: if you just need 'a simple bot'
audience_not_fit_2: if there's no budget for automation
audience_not_fit_3: if the decision is based solely on price
task_1_desc: Finding clients on Telegram / VK / open sources
task_2_desc: Internal knowledge bases, analytics, data-driven answers
case_1_problem_text: Manual processing of applications and communication with clients took up most of the employees' working time.
case_1_solution_text: An automated bot in Telegram handles initial inquiries, collects data, qualifies leads, and passes hot clients to managers.
case_1_why_text: Managers focus on sales, not routine tasks. Application processing time was reduced by 3 times, and conversion increased by 40%.
case_2_problem_text: Employees spent a lot of time searching for information in different systems and documents.
case_2_solution_text: An AI assistant based on RAG technology unified all internal knowledge bases and answers employee questions instantly.
case_2_why_text: Information search time was reduced from 15 minutes to 30 seconds. New employees get up to speed faster.
case_3_problem_text: A marketplace seller spent 2-3 hours a day manually checking inventory, prices, and reviews.
case_3_solution_text: Automation of marketplace monitoring: low stock notifications, automatic price updates, collection and analysis of reviews.
case_3_why_text: Freed up 10+ hours a week for assortment and marketing work. Sales increased due to prompt response.
case_4_problem_text: The seller's team spent a lot of time manually collecting reports for investors from various sources. The data quickly became outdated, and the process was long and prone to errors.
case_4_solution_text: A web dashboard with automatic data updates. It collects metrics from the marketplace database, visualizes key indicators as graphs, and shows the current picture in real time.
case_4_why_text: Reports are no longer compiled manually. Now, indicators can be shown to an investor in a minute. The data became honest, relevant, and clear, which simplified communication and control.
case_5_problem_text: Sales of subscriptions for a digital service were done manually through chats, which led to errors, overwhelmed managers, and poor scalability.
case_5_solution_text: A Telegram bot that automates the process: accepting payments, automatically granting access, managing subscriptions, a referral system, and collecting statistics.
case_5_why_text: Sales became faster and more stable, with manual work practically disappearing. Analytics and full control emerged. The bot created a scalable sales channel right in the messenger.
case_6_problem_text: Checking the knowledge of new employees was done manually, taking up managers' time. There were no unified statistics, and it was difficult to test many people at once.
case_6_solution_text: A Telegram bot for conducting attestations, fully managed through Google Sheets. It asks questions, records results, and allows for parallel testing of any number of employees.
case_6_why_text: Managers and HR no longer waste time on manual checks. A transparent history of tests appeared, and the onboarding and attestation process became fast and easily scalable.
process_step_1_title: Analyze the task and business goal
process_step_2_title: Propose a solution and fix the result
process_step_3_title: Calculate cost by value, not by hours
process_footer: We don't sell hours. We create working solutions for business tasks.
packages_bot_lite_desc: Ideal for startups and small projects
packages_bot_lite_feature_2: Welcome menu, questionnaires, quizzes, notification subscription
packages_bot_lite_feature_4: Works without connecting external services and APIs
packages_bot_standard_desc: Optimal solution for a growing business
packages_bot_standard_feature_2: Limited connection to services via API
packages_bot_standard_feature_4: 1 AI scenario (e.g., chat assistant, request classification, product selection)
packages_bot_pro_feature_5: Bot learns from documents, knowledge bases, websites
packages_app_lite_desc: Ideal for startups and small projects
packages_app_standard_desc: Optimal solution for a growing business
packages_app_standard_feature_2: Up to 3 pages + personal account (simple version)
packages_app_standard_feature_5: Can connect payments/crypto (regular, without smart contracts)
packages_app_standard_feature_6: Admin panel only in the bot (viewing applications, moderation)
packages_app_pro_feature_2: Complex admin panel (in MiniApp and/or bot)
packages_app_pro_feature_3: Complex personal accounts (roles, analytics, filters, cart)
packages_app_pro_feature_4: AI functions - RAG — search by knowledge base/documents
about_primary: We are a team of experienced developers, designers, and technology enthusiasts. We create digital products that solve real business problems and change industries. We work as a product team, not just a contractor.
about_secondary: Our approach is based on a deep understanding of client needs, the use of modern technologies, and a commitment to excellence in every detail. We help startups and large companies create innovative solutions that set them apart in the market and bring real value to users.
modal_success_text: We have received your application and will contact you shortly.
